overview: Enjoy the explosive energy of Guckkasten in theaters! The best performance ever, HAPPENING is showing! The 2016 concert HAPPENING by the band Guckkasten was greatly loved for its passionate performance.  Guckkasten unleashes explosive energy that overwhelms the audience through their excellent singing ability and perfect live performance. Experience the large-scale concert with colorful videos, special effects and sounds on the mega-sized stage through the screens at the movie theater.
title: Guckkasten Live Concert: HAPPENING
